attributes.action: Close boarders in and out of the uk for all travel other than goods stop Covid
attributes.additional_details: We can not possibly rely on this vaccine when we are still letting so many people in and out of the country.
attributes.background: Close the boarders in and out of the uk other than goods while we are in lockdown, as other countries did to minimise the spread. stop people bringing it in to us and us taking it out. we are an island just like others have we should be using that to our advantage to stop the spread and beat this.
